results.title: Association between single nucleotide polymorphism SLCO1B1 gene and simvastatin pleiotropic effects measured through flow-mediated dilation endothelial function parameters
results.text_hl: Genetic polymorphism in @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ resistance can also affect the pleiotropic effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin induces a central hypotensive effect via Ras-mediated signalling to cause eNOS up-regulation.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ induces a central @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotensive@@@ effect via Ras-mediated signalling to cause @GENE_NOS3 @GENE_24600 @@@eNOS@@@ up-regulation.

results.title: Simvastatin normalizes autonomic neural control in experimental heart failure.
results.text_hl: In @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@ @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ treated with 3 mg x kg(-1) x d(-1) @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, baroreflex regulation of heart rate to transient @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Nitroprusside @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009599 @@@sodium nitroprusside@@@ was normalized by 66% compared with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@ controls.

citations.NLM: Pliquett RU, Cornish KG, Peuler JD, Zucker IH. Simvastatin normalizes autonomic neural control in experimental heart failure. Circulation. 2003 May 20;107(19):2493-8. PMID: 12695293

results.title: Effect of statins on blood pressure: Analysis on adverse events released by FDA.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Comparing the reporting rate of @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ event between statins and other drugs found that @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ (pooled ROR = 1.26, adjusted p-value = 8.60 x 10-4) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (pooled ROR = 1.94, adjusted p-value = 4.16 x 10-45) were significantly associated with @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@reduction in BP@@@.

citations.NLM: You T, Liu XG, Hou XD, Wang XK, Xie HH, Ding F, Yi K, Zhang P, Xie XD. Effect of statins on blood pressure: Analysis on adverse events released by FDA. Clin Exp Hypertens. 2017;39(4):325-329. PMID: 28513233
